long_description: A modern interpretation of a timeless silhouette, the Smith Chemist polarized sunglasses shield your eyes from the sun and glare with smart style. Polarized carbonic polycarbonate lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Black frames feature gray-tint lenses, ideal for bright days and direct sunlight. Tortoise Army frames feature brown-tint lenses that enhance your vision in a wide range of light and weather conditions. Handmade acetate frames feature sculpted temples with stainless-steel spring hinges and embedded metallic Smith logo.
short_description: A modern interpretation of a timeless silhouette, the Smith Chemist polarized sunglasses shield your eyes from the sun and glare with smart style.
